description: Sven Halek, after a private discussion with a confidant and weighing the city's crisis, decides to activate a hidden protocol that will restore erased BCI identities and expose suppressed evidence of BCI abuses at dawn.

Citywide, restored personal records and details of vanished citizens reappear in official inboxes. Families are reunited as those previously erased reclaim their identities. Revelations of BCI abuses begin surfacing in public channels.
Public gatherings intensify as citizens compare restored data and recount stories of disappearance and BCI manipulation, spreading new outrage and solidarity across Stenograd.
Council factions face an internal crisis over the revelations: Harmonists urge amnesty and full transparency, while the Directorate pushes for tighter controls over restored data and identities.

A citywide referendum is announced, forcing the Council into direct and transparent negotiations with citizen representatives on a new governance system focused on data rights, restoration, and future BCI oversight.
